EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to HeadStart! You can access your Profile now!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey, {!HS_Activity__c.Young_Person__c}!
WOOHOO!
Welcome to the HeadStart team!
We are really excited that you have committed to making a difference in your community, and giving yourself a head start at the same time! We look forward to hearing about your volunteering throughout your HeadStart journey!
Get started!
The first step is to choose where you will be volunteering!
Need some advice on finding somewhere to volunteer? We've got some handy tips to help you get started! Check them out here: https://www.headstart-thechallenge.org/about/find-your-own-volunteering/
Know where you are volunteering? Make sure it's recorded so you can log hours on your HeadStart Profile: https://www.headstart-thechallenge.org/
Your Kick Off details are live on the Event section of your HeadStart Profile NOW!
Tickets are limited - get yours ASAP!
Kick Off is an awesome opportunity to launch your HeadStart journey and prepare yourself to get ahead! You will be encouraged to explore your journey options, set your own goals, understand how you can use your volunteering to achieve them, and learn about how to make the most of your volunteering!
Don't forget!
We want to know WHY you've signed up to HeadStart! We're giving away prizes to the best post from a HeadStarter on every NCS Summer wave!
#HSGiveTime
** Any questions?
